constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 77 (Tuesday, May 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TORRES of New York:
H.R. 3002.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8.
[Page H2142]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to require Amtrak to adopt the repair-in-place method for track maintenance and rehabilitation, and for other purposes.
